name: Zull: A procedurally generated platformer
description:
Hello everyone,

Here is ZULL, a procedurally generated platformer where you have to slow down time to survive!

There is an epic tutorial level included to get you through the basics!

Please drop a comment on what you think of our game, anything good or bad is accepted!
This game was submitted for Ludumdare #37, and it was such an awesome experience (And a little stressful towards the end). =)

We are going to work on the game much more and improve it a lot over time, actively working on it. We are going to add new features and make it look much better as we work on it more!

Please leave a donation if you would like to support the further development of this game!

Enjoy!
